name: STOP COVID-19
description:
Information

"STOP COVID-19" simple arcade shooter about the fight against coronavirus creating with GDevelop.

Goal of the game: Destroy the maximum number of viruses COVID-19 from the sanitizer before the viruses get into their hands.

Made for the #CoronaVirusGameJam 

https://itch.io/jam/coronavirus-game-jam

Controls

"w" to move up, "s" to move down, "x" to fire.
